author: andyc
msg: Added some clarifying text to the entity management info to
remove ambiguity regarding entity manager and scanner
"singletons". Now it is clear that there is only one entity
manager and entity scanner per parser instance and that
these objects are not shared between all parser instances.

author: jeffreyr
msg: Had wrong value for absolute  minimum/maximum facet values

author: jeffreyr
msg: A Parser object instanciates an XMLEntityManager, then the XMLEntityManager default constructor creates
the XMLScanner. Only access to scanner is through XMLEntityManager getEntityScanner method.

author: jeffreyr
msg: More Singleton for entity manager and entity scanner setup
